events.message: I ordered a jacket last week and I would like to request a refund because it doesn't fit at all.
The case has been categorized as Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to sizing issues.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I understand you'd like a refund for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please confirm if the jacket was worn or used, and provide the order number to proceed with the refund?
The jacket is still in its original packaging and has not been worn. My order number is 123456789.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate your refund and send you a prepaid return label to send the jacket back.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the return label being prepaid.
Your refund has been processed successfully after receiving the returned jacket. You should see the amount credited shortly.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Thank you for contacting us. We are closing this case now as your refund issue has been resolved to your satisfaction.
